title: Leopard, Ram, and Jackal
description: This delightful African fable tells how fierce Leopard is actually afraid of mild Ram. Jackal tries to force his friend to be brave and face Ram. But Ram's wife tricks Leopard, and Jackal ends up paying the price in this humorous tale.
meta: bruised, dragging, fierce, foolish, gruff, hunter, jerked, juicy, leaped, meekly
Retell to understand and remember story events
Sequence Events : Sequence events in a story
Long Vowel Sounds : Discriminate long vowel /e/ sound
Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraphs ea and ee
Quotation Marks : Recognize and understand the use of quotation marks
Synonyms : Identify words that mean the same (synonyms)

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
